## Description {#details}

Represents a character encoded in LLVM&#39;s Char6 encoding.

This format is suitable for encoding decimal numbers (without signs or exponents) and C identifiers (without dollar signs), but not much else.


<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="http://llvm.org/docs/BitCodeFormat.html#char6-encoded-value">http://llvm.org/docs/BitCodeFormat.html#char6-encoded-value</a>
</SectionUser>
